item.description:
Announcing: Winter Salsa Practices on 12/2, 12/9, and 12/16!
Practices are Open to the Public!
Let's all practice in a fun and different environment--it's not a class and not a club!
Carlos & Louise will host open salsa practices each Sunday from 4:30-6:00 pm at the Community Art Center located at 119 Windsor St in Cambridge.

We will provide music, mirrors, hard wood floors, and a few fun, welcoming people to get the dancing started! There will be no organized instruction, so all participants should come ready to learn from and to help each other. COST: $5;

For directions: http://metamovements....

For a special "meet-up discount to Ryles: http://metamovements....

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Open Salsa Practices at the Community Art Center
